Name: Wanderfruit Juice Lv.2
Description2$english: Made with specially blended fresh fruit juice, it's sweet and tangy, hitting your taste buds with every sip. It's the perfect appetizer drink before a meal.

recipes.Name: Wanderfruit Juice
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
A specially blended fruit juice that's sweet and tangy, delivering a refreshing jolt to your taste buds. A perfect pre-meal pick-me-up.
